summary: Makes the dwemer attunement sphere craftable.
descriptionHtml:
1.01 update. added ability to craft Dwarven Oil from Taproot. at a cooking pot.

This mod simply makes the dwemer attunement sphere used to access Blackreach in to a craftable item.
<br />
<br />
<br />To Install simply extract CraftableSphere.esp into Skyrim's data folder.
<br />
<br />
<br />I made this mod because I wanted another means to acquire an Attunement Sphere other then Septimus Signus. In the future I intend to add other useful items such as Dwarven Oil and any other suggested odds and ends.
<br />
<br />If you like then please endorse, share, and suggest improvements and crafting recopies.Â
author: tnu
